title: FORCE_CINEMATIC_RENDERING_THIS_UPDATE
content:
0xA41BCD7213805AAC0xFBB85E02// ForceCinematicRenderingThisUpdate
void FORCE_CINEMATIC_RENDERING_THIS_UPDATE(BOOL enable);Parameters:enable: Whether it should force the cinematic rendering or not.Forces the camera to be in cinematic mode while the player is in a car. This has to be called every frame, e.g. in a Wait(0) loop.
